mapper.select: SELECT B.BID, B.MEMBER_MID, M.EMAIL, B.NAME, B.ADDRESS, B.IMAGE, B.INTRODUCTION, B.CREATED_AT, B.MODIFIED_AT FROM BRANCH B, MEMBER M WHERE B.MEMBER_MID = M.MID AND B.MEMBER_MID = #{ value } AND M.IS_APPROVAL = '승인'
SELECT B.name FROM BRANCH B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.member_mid = M.mid WHERE M.IS_APPROVAL = '승인' ORDER BY name
SELECT B.BID, B.MEMBER_MID, M.EMAIL, M.ROLE, B.NAME, B.ADDRESS, b.lat, b.lng, B.IMAGE, B.INTRODUCTION FROM BRANCH B, MEMBER M WHERE B.MEMBER_MID = M.MID AND M.ROLE = 'ROLE_BRANCH' ORDER BY name

SELECT B.BID, B.MEMBER_MID, M.EMAIL, M.ROLE, B.NAME, B.ADDRESS, b.lat, b.lng, B.IMAGE, B.INTRODUCTION FROM BRANCH B, MEMBER M WHERE B.MEMBER_MID = M.MID AND M.IS_APPROVAL = '승인' AND B.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' ORDER BY name
